alwaysRequiresAuth.description: If true, then all routes will require the user to be signed in.

apiGatewayEndpoint.description: Endpoint to use for previews. Should be auto-populated by your stack.

defaultBucket.description: Default bucket users will see upon navigating to the catalog.

disableSignUp.description: If true, don't show Sign Up UI. Useful for private/business catalogs.

federations.description: List of links to federations you want your catalog to be aware of.

intercomAppId.description: Connects orange chat icon to our Intercom. If absent, icon does not show.

registryUrl.description: Registry your users will use to login and get credentials.

sentryDSN.description: Token used for logging to Sentry.

signInRedirect.description: Where users will be redirected upon successful login.

signOutRedirect.description: Where users will be redirected upon successful logout.

suggestedBuckets.description: List of buckets you want to appear in the dropdown menu in your catalog.

analyticsBucket.description: Bucket where object analytics data is stored

s3Proxy.description: Proxy server to use to get around S3 buckets with no CORS policies.
